Improve this doc View source

uiGridOneBindSrc
directive in module ui.grid

Description

One time binding for the src dom tag.

Usage

as attribute
<img ui-grid-one-bind-src="{String}">
   ...
</img>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
uiGridOneBindSrcString

The angular string you want to bind. Does not support interpolation. Don't use {{scopeElt}} instead use scopeElt.
